Fiat C.R.42 dighter made by KorianHUN

Download: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/fiat_c_r_42/

SPECS: (real/KSP)

weight: 2782kg / 3000Kg

power: 840HP / 880HP ( Fly with 1/3 thrust for realistic feel )

speed: 400km/h / 300km/h (1/3 thrust)

flight time: 1H57min / 2H42min (1/3 thrust)

range: 780km / 810km (1/3 thrust)

climb rate: 11,8m/s / 7,5-8m/s (1/3 thrust)

The plane has no guns, until someone makes a normal machinegun mod
